comments.body: Should we being doing a similar test for Windows? Would it make sense to move this to `run_test.sh`?
I'm not sure virtualenv was ever even a problem on windows, and regardless I don't think this PR changes virtualenv's behavior on Windows.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +34,38 @@      virtualenv -p "$(which python)" /tmp/venv-$$                                # [not win]
      source /tmp/venv-$$/bin/activate                                            # [not win]
      python -c 'import sys ; sys.exit(not hasattr(sys, "real_prefix"))'          # [not win]
  imports:
    - virtualenv
